name: Red Hood Monster Slayer
description:
This game was made for the Unofficial Gameboy Jam, where the jammers need to make a game with the Gameboy camera ratio (160px X 144px) and can only use four colors to produce the visual assets.

Red Hood Monster Slayer is a game based in the Castlevania series, where you control a whip-wielding demon hunter in a quest to slay the forces of evil.

For now, the game has only a bit to offer, due to the fact that the developers already have a lot of projects in development. But we're considering continue the development of the game in our small free time, so we're probably making updates.

While this doesn't happen, you can enjoy our little initial version!

Controls:

Left and Right arrows - Walk;

Up arrow - Aim up;

Down arrow - crouch;

Space - jump;

Left Control - attack;

Tips:

- While in mid air, you can cancel the jump by pressing space again;

- To have a better attack precision, you must point the direction of the attack before making it. For example: down - left - Ctrl.
